short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make your Reddit sidebar actually useful. View the OPs and the subreddit's recent/hot/top comments & posts without clicking away

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Redbar adds the following features to your Reddit experience in a neat sidebar that seamlessly integrates into Reddit:

✅ OP Details: see the OPs post & comment karma + their cake day

✅ OP Comments & Posts: see the OPs recent, top and hot comments & posts without clicking away

✅ Subreddit Details: see the subreddit's description, subscriber count and active count (though to be fair, you could already see this on Reddit's sidebar)

✅ Subreddit Posts: see the subreddit's recent, top and hot posts without clicking away

Feedback is appreciated! There's a feedback link in the extension that you can use :)

---

Changelog

## 0.1.1

### Fixed

- Bug where the user view would not be disabled when the user is deleted
- Overlapping with Reddit Enhancement Suite chrome extension
- Incorrect width on MacOS
- Incorrect popup icon (previously showing WXT generic icon)
- Incorrect popup (previously showing WXT generic popup)

## 0.1.0

- Initial release
